subject: Physical Fitness
title: Lifting Heavy Won't Make You Bulky
description: A 60-second lesson on Lifting Heavy Won't Make You Bulky.

hook.text: Many people avoid heavy weights fearing they'll wake up looking like a bodybuilder. They won't.

buildup.text: Building significant muscle mass requires years of dedicated training, caloric surplus, and genetics.

punchline.text: Getting accidentally bulky is like accidentally running a marathon.
